jd: Hi,I hope you are doing well.I am Raj from NITYA Software Solutions Inc.I've included below the job description, please let me know if you are interested, and reply with one updated resume, which I've expected.Role: Senior Technical Business Analyst Serve as a liaison between business challenges and technology solutionsAnalyze business processes and identify business needsPropose solutions involving software system development, process improvements, or organizational changesGather and document requirementsConduct business and systems analysisCreate specifications for systems to meet business requirementsOversee the implementation of systemsCommunicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholdersWrite user stories for dev and EQA teamExperience with media player and entertainment domainProven experience in analytics and systems developmentProficiency with digital analytics tools like Google Analytics and Google Ad ManagerThank you,RajkumarEMAIL ID:rajkumar.v@nityainc.comNITYA Software Solutions Inc.
